reviewText: My daughter loves Sid the Science Kid but always misses it while she's at school so I purchased this video for her to watch when she's home. She loves it! I love how this show it's always teaching you things but does so in a playful manner that keeps your child's attention. My daughter has learned all about friction and inertia and more just from watching this video and having fun with Sid the Science Kid. I would definitely recommend these videos to anyone with younger kids.
My son loves these, we try many of the experiments at home.  He learns so much about science and learning on his own.  The best series any mother could ask for.  Way to go Jim Henson!

My 2 year old loves Sid!  This was a great price for 4 episodes and the quality is beautiful.  These programs are fact and fun filled, each episode includes "real life" kids doing an investigation, and a great teaching song with Teacher Susie.  My daughter loves the music, the fun, and the humor.  Another great show from Jim Henson's company.

I bought this dvd for my 4 year old grandson, he has been watching Sid since he was 2.  It is such a good show for young kids, I love watching it with him, we even do some of the investigation projects that they do in the show. I recommend it for parents and grandparents to have it really is a great show.

My son (2.5) loves this DVD. He acts along with the skits and now has a very basic understanding of the forces of motion (force, friction, inertia, and elasticity). Because of this dvd, when he falls or hurts himself, we can discuss what happened and when he realizes there was "too little friction between his socks and the floor", he gets excited about knowing what happened and is no longer upset.

We bought a 5-pack of Sid DVDs on Woot.com and can't wait to give them to him. As much as I like this particular DVD, I am getting a bit tired of it. I do feel there's a great re-watch-ability to the Sid shows:)

Sid the science kid is a must for young kids. My grandson starting watching it at age three and has picked up an amazing vocabulary and science concepts. I find it entertaining, too. Quick delivery, reliable seller.

My 4 year old loves Sid!  My son has used some of the terms he learned from this video in every day life!  We were out shopping when he was talking about inertia and friction.  Another adult asked me how my very young son knew such big concepts.  I told him Sid the Science Kid! :)
great
My granddaughter loves these DVDs and so do I.  She watches them over and over again.

My grandson loves the videos...It was rather sad though that the case they came in was cracked and they can't keep the videos in it for fear they will get scratched.  My grandson is a "special needs" child and Sid is something he has latched onto and really enjoys.

Great songs that have a catchy tune.  Stuck in my head for days! Makes learning fun for many age levels. Although geared towards preschool, primary students will find concepts appropriate as well.  Loved the observations and wrote along with Sid in a science notebook!
Granddaughter loves it !!!

This next in the series meets expectations of all the other and is well recommended.
Sid the Science Kid...  I would buy it again.
My kids love watching Sid, and they learn something new all the time. My kids ask to watch Sid over Disney videos. Sid has no scary parts, and he teaches.
This is the greatest show for teaching scientific concepts to little kids. I only wish they would include the review episode on the DVD's!
The Sid shows are the best for younger kids.  They teach Science in a fun way and the characters are very likable. The experiments are things that you can easily do with your child at home.
Sid is always good and educational
My child LOVES it!

This is perfect for car rides. I love Sid the Science Kid because he sings, dances, plays well with others and teaches a lot of fun science facts. Thi 3 pack has hours of shows to keep little ones entertained. My 3 year old LOVES the series.

Love the graphics and the lessons taught.  Saw this series at a friends house earlier this year with her two year old and we both had a blast watching them.  Jim Henson is always a win in my book.  Especially as it encourages kids to ask questions about the world around them.  I bought a bunch of these for my 2 yr old niece and she's having a blast being introduced to Sid and his crew.  Fun & Educational to boot too!!!
Our great grand kids like these movies so they have watched this one with interest.
GREAT product.
These shows are entertaining and educational! After my five year old son watches then he is ready to talk about what he learned and do experiments in our home. He has taught me so much too!
Bought it as a gift for my granddaughter, she loved it!!
Did not disappoint
Boys love it I've had to watch it a hundred times already
